pages.about: About Winter Grove: Our Story & Values 18+ Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Discover the Heart of Winter Grove At Winter Grove Hotel, we believe in crafting extraordinary experiences in the most enchanting winter setting. Nestled in a pristine, snow-covered landscape, our hotel is more than just a place to stay – it's a destination where every detail is designed to captivate and delight. From our inception, Winter Grove has been driven by a passion for hospitality and a love for the magic of winter. Our story is one of transformation – turning a serene, snowy haven into a luxurious retreat that blends rustic charm with modern elegance. Here, every guest is invited to embark on a journey of relaxation, adventure, and unparalleled comfort. Our Mission Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our unique offerings: from dining under the stars in private igloos to exploring the wilderness on snow safaris, and from ice sculpting workshops to exclusive Aurora Borealis viewings. At Winter Grove, we strive to create moments that are as unique as the snowflakes that blanket our grounds. Join us at Winter Grove Hotel, and let us transport you to a world where every stay is a story waiting to be told, and every guest becomes part of our winter fairy tale. Welcome to where snowflakes and dreams converge – welcome to Winter Grove. Our Values: Embodying Excellence at Winter Grove Enchanted Hospitality At Winter Grove, we transform hospitality into an enchanting experience. Our staff are not just hosts; they are storytellers, dedicated to making every moment magical and memorable. Expect personalized service that feels like a warm hug in a winter wonderland. Winter Wonderland Adventures Adventure is at the heart of Winter Grove. We curate exclusive, thrilling experiences that embrace the beauty and excitement of the season. From snow safaris to private ice skating, our activities are designed to create unforgettable memories in the snow. Artistic Elegance We believe in the art of living well. Our hotel is a canvas where rustic charm meets modern sophistication. From ice sculpting workshops to elegantly designed rooms, every detail is crafted to reflect the unique beauty of winter. Sustainable Serenity Winter Grove is committed to preserving the pristine beauty that surrounds us. Our sustainable practices ensure that our winter wonderland remains unspoiled for future generations. We embrace eco-friendly initiatives that blend seamlessly with luxurious comfort. Culinary Magic Dining at Winter Grove is a feast for the senses. Our culinary team conjures up gourmet delights that celebrate local flavors and seasonal ingredients. Enjoy an igloo dining experience under the stars, where each meal is a spellbinding journey of taste and aroma. Contact Us Our Team: The Driving Force Behind Winter Grove At Winter Grove, our team embodies a passion for hospitality and a commitment to creating unforgettable experiences in our winter wonderland. Each member of our staff is carefully selected for their dedication, warmth, and expertise, ensuring that every guest feels welcomed and valued from the moment they arrive. Sarah Miller Guest Experience Specialist Sarah brings a wealth of experience in hospitality, having worked in luxury hotels around the world before joining Winter Grove. Her infectious enthusiasm and attention to detail ensure that each guest receives personalized care tailored to their preferences. Whether arranging special activities or anticipating guest needs, Sarah is dedicated to exceeding expectations and creating lasting memories. Michael Johnson Executive Chef Michael is the creative genius behind the exquisite culinary experiences at Winter Grove. With a background in Michelin-starred restaurants and a passion for seasonal and locally sourced ingredients, Michael crafts menus that delight and inspire. From intimate dinners in our igloos to elaborate event catering, Michael's culinary creations elevate every dining experience to a new level of excellence. Customer Reviews Guest Review 1 June 10, 2024 I had the pleasure of staying at Winter Grove during a business trip, and I must say it exceeded all my expectations. The staff, especially Natasha Ivanova, made me feel incredibly welcomed from the moment I arrived. The room was spacious, elegantly designed, and had all the amenities I needed for a productive stay. The highlight for me was the delicious meals prepared by Chef Michael Thompson; each dish was a culinary masterpiece. I highly recommend Winter Grove for anyone looking for a blend of luxury, comfort, and exceptional service. Guest Review 2 May 28, 2024 "Our stay at Winter Grove was nothing short of amazing. From the moment we checked in, we were greeted with warmth and professionalism by the entire staff. Natasha Ivanova went above and beyond to ensure our requests were met promptly and with a smile. The room was impeccably clean and beautifully decorated, providing a serene retreat after a day of exploring the city. The attention to detail throughout our stay, from the personalized welcome amenities to the thoughtful restaurant recommendations, made us feel like valued guests. We can't wait to return to Winter Grove for another memorable stay!" pages.dining: Dining at Winter Grove: Culinary Delights 18+ Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Culinary Delights at Winter Grove Indulge your senses at Winter Grove's exceptional restaurants, where culinary excellence meets the enchanting beauty of a snow-covered landscape. Whether you're craving a cozy dinner by the fire or a unique dining experience under the stars in our private igloos, our restaurants offer a variety of flavors and settings to suit every taste. Discover the artistry of our chefs, the warmth of our hospitality, and the joy of dining in our winter paradise. Our Restaurants and Bars At Winter Grove, we take pride in offering a diverse array of dining options that cater to every palate and occasion. Whether you're seeking a romantic dinner for two, a family celebration, or a casual meal with friends, our restaurants and bars provide the perfect setting amidst the picturesque winter scenery. Fireside Lounge & Grill Nestled by a crackling fireplace, the Fireside Lounge & Grill offers a cozy ambiance with views of the snow-covered landscape. Enjoy a menu featuring hearty grilled dishes, local specialties, and an extensive selection of wines and craft cocktails. It's the ideal spot to unwind after a day of exploring the winter wonderland. Aurora Borealis Rooftop Bar Ascend to our rooftop bar for breathtaking views of the northern lights dancing across the night sky. The Aurora Borealis Rooftop Bar serves up handcrafted cocktails and small plates, creating an intimate and magical setting to enjoy the natural spectacle of the aurora. Igloo Dining Experience For a truly unique dining experience, reserve one of our private igloos. Dine under the stars while staying warm and cozy inside your own igloo, complete with personal service and a specially curated menu of seasonal delights. Perfect for a romantic evening or a memorable gathering with friends. Snowflake Cafe & Bakery Start your day at the Snowflake Cafe & Bakery, where the aroma of freshly baked pastries and gourmet coffee welcomes you. This charming cafe offers a selection of light bites, sandwiches, and decadent desserts, all crafted with care using locally sourced ingredients. It's the ideal spot for a quick bite or a leisurely afternoon treat. Special Offers and Promotions Explore our latest special offers and promotions designed to enhance your stay at Winter Grove. Whether you're planning a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a solo retreat, take advantage of these unique opportunities to create unforgettable memories in our winter wonderland. Winter Romance Package Ignite the sparks with our Winter Romance Package, featuring a cozy accommodation, gourmet dinner for two at our Fireside Lounge & Grill, and a bottle of champagne upon arrival. Perfect for celebrating love amidst the enchanting winter scenery. Family Fun Snow Adventure Embark on a family adventure with our Family Fun Snow Adventure package. Enjoy discounted rates on connecting rooms, complimentary breakfast for the kids, and access to our snowshoeing trails and ice skating rink. Create cherished moments with your loved ones in the snow. Spa Retreat Package Indulge in relaxation with our Spa Retreat Package, offering a rejuvenating spa treatment, access to our sauna and hot tub facilities, and a healthy lunch at our Snowflake Cafe & Bakery. Treat yourself to a day of pampering and tranquility in our serene winter oasis. Extended Stay Savings Stay longer and save with our Extended Stay Savings promotion. Enjoy discounted rates on accommodations for stays of three nights or more, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the beauty and serenity of Winter Grove at your leisure. pages.index: Welcome to Winter Grove: Luxury Awaits 18+ Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Welcome to Winter Grove Hotel Nestled in a serene, snow-covered wonderland, Winter Grove Hotel offers a unique blend of rustic charm and modern comfort. Surrounded by pristine winter landscapes, our hotel provides the perfect escape for those seeking tranquility and adventure. Enjoy the breathtaking views, cozy up by the fireplace, and experience the magic of winter like never before. Come and discover the beauty of Winter Grove – where every stay is a snow-kissed dream come true. Immerse Yourself in Luxury and Comfort At Winter Grove Hotel, we redefine the art of hospitality by offering an unparalleled experience of luxury and comfort amidst the enchanting snow-covered landscapes. Our meticulously designed rooms, exceptional amenities, and attentive service ensure that your stay is nothing short of extraordinary. Whether you're here to explore the winter wonderland or simply unwind in a tranquil setting, Winter Grove Hotel is your perfect retreat. Elegant Accommodations Our spacious rooms and suites are thoughtfully designed to provide a serene and luxurious environment. Featuring plush bedding, modern furnishings, and stunning views of the snowy surroundings, each room is a haven of relaxation. Gourmet Dining Indulge in a culinary journey at our on-site restaurant, where our expert chefs create exquisite dishes using the finest local ingredients. From hearty breakfasts to elegant dinners, our menu offers a delightful fusion of flavors that will tantalize your taste buds. Rejuvenating Spa Escape the cold and rejuvenate your body and mind at our luxurious spa. Offering a range of treatments, from soothing massages to invigorating facials, our skilled therapists are dedicated to providing you with the ultimate relaxation experience. Discover Winter Grove Hotel Welcome to Winter Grove Hotel, your luxurious escape in a stunning snow-covered paradise. Experience the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern elegance, with cozy fireplaces, gourmet dining, and a rejuvenating spa. Nestled in breathtaking winter landscapes, Winter Grove Hotel offers the ultimate retreat for relaxation and adventure. Come and create unforgettable memories in our winter wonderland! Learn more Ready to Experience Luxury? Step into Winter Grove Hotel, where luxury meets the serene beauty of a snow-covered wonderland. Indulge in our elegant accommodations, savor gourmet dining, and rejuvenate in our tranquil spa. Surrounded by breathtaking winter landscapes, every moment at Winter Grove Hotel promises an unforgettable escape. Are you ready to experience unparalleled luxury and comfort? Contact Us Discover Our Premier Services Igloo Dining Experience Dine under the stars in our exclusive, private igloos. Enjoy a gourmet meal surrounded by the beauty of a snowy landscape, with a personal heater to keep you warm. This intimate dining setting provides a magical and unforgettable experience. Snow Safari Adventures Embark on a thrilling snow safari adventure through pristine winter trails. Our guided tours offer a unique opportunity to explore the breathtaking scenery on snowmobiles or dog sleds, giving you a true taste of winter wilderness. Ice Sculpting Workshops Unleash your creativity in our hands-on ice sculpting workshops. Guided by professional ice artists, you’ll learn the art of transforming blocks of ice into stunning sculptures, creating a memorable and artistic experience. Aurora Borealis Viewing Deck Experience the northern lights like never before from our dedicated Aurora Borealis viewing deck. Equipped with cozy seating and telescopes, this spot offers the perfect vantage point to witness the mesmerizing dance of the northern lights. Snowshoeing and Hot Cocoa Trails Explore the serene beauty of Winter Grove on our snowshoeing trails. Afterward, warm up with a complimentary hot cocoa from our signature hot chocolate bar, offering a variety of flavors and toppings to customize your drink. Private Ice Skating Rink Glide across our private ice skating rink reserved exclusively for hotel guests. With a backdrop of twinkling fairy lights and snow-covered trees, this enchanting rink provides a perfect winter wonderland experience, complete with skate rentals and cozy blankets. Book Your Winter Wonderland Escape Don't miss out on your dream winter getaway! Fill out the form below to secure your stay at Winter Grove Hotel, where luxury and the beauty of a snow-covered paradise await. Whether you're planning a romantic retreat, a family adventure, or a solo escape, we're here to make your stay unforgettable. Let us help you create the perfect winter retreat. Provide your details in the form below to customize your experience at Winter Grove Hotel. From selecting the ideal room to booking exclusive activities, we ensure every aspect of your stay is tailored to your desires. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy of Winter Grove 18+ Casino About Us Dining Contact Us Privacy Policy for Winter Grove Introduction Welcome to Winter Grove Hotel's Privacy Policy page. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. Information We Collect We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you make a reservation, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us through forms on our website. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment details. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to process reservations, improve our services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience at Winter Grove Hotel. We may also use your information to send promotional emails or newsletters if you have opted in to receive them. Disclosure of Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties unless we provide you with advance notice. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Security of Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Policy We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the updated Privacy Policy will indicate the date it was last revised. You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information below: Email: wintergrove@gmail.com Old Spitalfields Market, Brushfield St, London E1 6BG, Great Britain Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Old Spitalfields Market, Brushfield St, London E1 6BG, Great Britain Casino About Us Dining Contact Us +44-20-1152-8641 We use cookies on the Winter Grove website to enhance your browsing experience.
